attributes.action: give fathers a veto over abortions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recognise that the male partner of a pregnant woman (or sperm donor) has rights to decide the future of his unborn children and that a joint agreement must be made before a termination can be authorised.
Fathers must be recognised as equal parents from the point that conception was allowed to happen and as such they must have an equal right to determine the future of their unborn children, and both partners must agree before a pregnancy can be terminated rather than the current system that shuts out a fathers recourse to legal arbitration until after a child is born.
